content: The United States has an estimated 11 million unauthorized aliens, with 500,000 more entering each year. Around 1 million aliens are apprehended annually trying to enter illegally. Many come for economic opportunities or to escape strife, but some are criminals or terrorists. The difficulty in distinguishing between unauthorized aliens and potential terrorists or criminals raises concerns about national security.
